body_html:
@chenghuige @ebrevdo
Hey, I am also trying to do text classification - working with very sparse data. TF-IDF feature matrix in SVM light format. I understand the nn.embedding_lookup_sparse BUT your code for producing mini-batch sets does not randomly shuffle the dataset. Is there a good way to do it? Also, does your full_batch_set() have a bug because I get an error when I try to run that.

body:
@chenghuige @ebrevdo 
Hey, I am also trying to do text classification - working with very sparse data. TF-IDF feature matrix in SVM light format. I understand the nn.embedding_lookup_sparse BUT your code for producing mini-batch sets does not randomly shuffle the dataset. Is there a good way to do it? Also, does your full_batch_set() have a bug because I get an error when I try to run that.
